ConnectedAppSettings.name: ConnectedAppSettings
ConnectedAppSettings.label: Connected App Settings
ConnectedAppSettings.description: Represents ConnectedAppSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableAdminApprovedAppsOnly.description: enable Admin Approved Apps Only field of ConnectedAppSettings metadata component.

enableSkipUserProvisioningWizardWelcomeP.description: enable Skip User Provisioning Wizard Welcome Page field of ConnectedAppSettings metadata component.
